entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY

MOSTLY CLOUDY

CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
